addSite

public void addSite(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String address)
Description copied from class: VARSiteAdmin
This method is used to add information of remote site to database.

Parameters:
name - Name of the remote site.
address - Address of the site. The format is hostname:< port >, in advanced mode. In default mode VERSANT database name must be specified here.

Parameters:
name - Name of the site to be updated.
address - Modified address of the site. The format is hostname:< port >, in advanced mode. In default mode VERSANT database name must be specified here.

startSite

public void startSite(java.lang.String configFile,
                      java.io.PrintWriter writeTo)
Description copied from class: VARSiteAdmin
Starts replication process for local site in current database.

Parameters:
configFile - The name of the configuration file. Specify null for starting replication with default values. It uses default replication by default. Specify absolute or relative path to a configuration file for advanced replication.
writeTo - Specify a valid PrintWriter or null to ignore output.

writeTo - Specify a valid PrintWriter or null to ignore output.

listAllSites

public java.util.Properties listAllSites()
Description copied from class: VARSiteAdmin

    • "isDisabled" , < Boolean Value >
    • "address" , < String object >
    • "databases" , < String object >

status

public java.util.Properties status(java.lang.String module,
                                   java.lang.String configFile)
Description copied from class: VARSiteAdmin
Returns status of replication processes for local site.

Parameters:
module - null or a valid module name at local site.
configFile - The name of the configuration file. Specify null for using default values. Specify absolute or relative path to a configuration file for advanced replication.
Returns:
Returns properties object, Here is the tree structure of returned Properties object.
  • ModuleName , < VARStatus > - for modules which are running
  • ModuleName , < String > - for modules which are not running.

statistics

public java.util.Properties statistics(java.lang.String configFile)
Description copied from class: VARSiteAdmin
Retrieve statististical information for all modules of local site.

Parameters:
configFile - The name of the configuration file. Specify null for using default values. Specify absolute or relative path to a configuration file for advanced replication.
Returns:
Returns properties object, Here is the tree structure of returned Properties object.
For Advanced Replication Mode :
  • "SiteName" , < String Name of Site >
  • VARMessageReceiver.MODULE , < Properties >
      • < Site Name > , < Properties >
      • "numberOfReceived" , < Integer Value >
      • "nReceivedAndOwned" , < Integer Value >
    • < Site Name >, < Properties > ... list
  • VARTxRequestProcessor.MODULE , < Properties >
    • "nProcessed" , < Integer Value >
    • "nToBeProcessed" , < Long Value >
  • VARConflictHandler.MODULE , < Properties >
    • "nProcessed" ,< Integer Value >
    • "nRejected" ,< Integer Value >
    • "nToBeProcessed" ,< Integer Value >
  • VARTxMessageApplier.MODULE , < Properties >
    • "nApplied" ,< Integer Value > ,
    • "toBeApplied" ,< Integer Value >
  • VARTxMessageSender.MODULE , < Properties >
    • "PerSiteInfo" , < Properties >
    • < SiteName as Key > ,< Properties with following fields. >
      • "numberOfSent" ,< Integer Value >
      • "readyToBeSent" ,< Integer Value >
    • < SiteName as Key > ,< Properties with above fields. >
      • ... list
    • "nSenderUnprocessed" , < Integer Value >

For Default Replication Mode :
  • VARVDBReplicator.MODULE, < Properties >
    • "nProcessed" , < Integer Value >
    • "nToBeProcessed" , < Long Value >

explicit

public void explicit(java.lang.String configFile,
                     boolean explicitOption,
                     java.io.PrintWriter writeTo)
Description copied from class: VARSiteAdmin
Turns explicit replication on/off. Explicit replication is supported in advanced mode in Master-Slave configuration. The master site will start accumulating replication requests when explicit replication is turned on. The changes are merged and sent as a single unit to all slave when explicit replication is turned off. The transactional functionality is not maintained as the change requests are merged.

Parameters:
configFile - The name of the configuration file. Specify absolute or relative path to a configuration file for advanced replication.
explicitOption - Specify true/false to set the explicit replication on/off respectively.
writeTo - Specify a valid PrintWriter or null to ignore output.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Description copied from class: VARSiteAdmin
main method for this utility. It can be used as a reference by users who want to use api interface of VARSiteAdmin.

Parameters:
args - List of arguments.

cleanup

public void cleanup()
Description copied from class: VARSiteAdmin
Cleans up the session that gets created in constructor. VARSiteAdmin utility works in a session which is created in constructor. This session will be cleaned up when this method is invoked. It should be invoked in finally block by the caller.
